name: Go to the Top!
content:
[Use Conditions] You have a white LRIG and a red LRIG on your field.

Search your deck for a SIGNI, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck after doing so. If your opponent's Center LRIG's level is three or more, they choose and put three cards from their Ener Zone into their trash. (If there are two or less cards, they put all of them into the trash.)

name: Silent Assassin
content:
[Use Conditions] You have a red LRIG and a green LRIG on your field.

Until end of turn, up to two target SIGNI on your field gain "[Constant]: As long as the SIGNI in front of this SIGNI has power 12000 or more, this SIGNI gains 【Assassin】."
(A SIGNI with 【Assassin】 deals damage to your opponent directly rather than battling with the SIGNI in front of it when attacking.)

[Rise] Place on top of an <Atom> SIGNI on your field.
[Constant]: During your opponent's turn, if this SIGNI has one or more cards underneath it and would leave the field by your opponent's effects, instead you may put all cards underneath this SIGNI into their owner's trash.
[Auto]: Whenever this SIGNI attacks, draw a card or your opponent discards a card.
power_text: Draw two cards. Put up to one <Atom> SIGNI from your hand onto your field.

name: Honeyto Ice, Code: Order
content:
[Team] <Kyurukyurun☆>
[Team Auto]: At the beginning of your opponent's turn, if your opponent has two or more cards in their hand, they can only draw one card in total during the draw phase that turn.
[Auto]: At the beginning of your attack phase, each player draws a card. You look at your opponent's hand and choose a card without a {Guard Icon}. Put it on the bottom of its owner's deck.

name: Gaia, Jade Angel Queen
content:
[Auto]: At the beginning of your attack phase, if there are three or more <Angel> SIGNI on your field, 【Ener Charge 1】.
[Auto]: At the end of your turn, add up to one target <Angel> SIGNI from your Ener Zone to your hand.
[Auto]: At the end of your turn, you may pay {Colorless} {Colorless}. If you do, put target <Angel> SIGNI from your trash onto your field. The [Enter] abilities of SIGNI put onto your field this way do not activate.

[Auto]: When this SIGNI vanishes a SIGNI on your opponent's field through battle, it is awakened. (SIGNI stay awakened for as long as they remain on the field.)

[Auto]: At the beginning of your attack phase, discard up to three cards. Target SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -3000 power for each card discarded this way until end of turn.
[Enter]: If there are three or more blue SIGNI on your field, draw a card.

name: Hideyoshi, Jade General Queen
content:
[Constant]: If an [Auto], [Enter], or [Action] ability of your opponent's SIGNI activates, you may put two cards underneath this SIGNI into their owner's trash. If you do, the activated ability instead does nothing.
[Constant]: If this SIGNI would leave the field by your opponent's effects, instead you may put two cards underneath this SIGNI into their owner's trash. If you do, down this SIGNI.
[Enter]: Put up to four cards from your Ener Zone under this SIGNI.

name: Einstein, Jade Wisdom Queen
content:
[Auto]: At the beginning of your attack phase, if the total level of SIGNI on your field is even, 【Ener Charge 1】.
[Auto]: Whenever this SIGNI attacks, you may put any number of SIGNI whose total level is equal to eight from your Ener Zone into your trash. If you do, vanish target SIGNI on your opponent's field.

name: At//Memoria, Code: Labyrinth
content:
[Constant]: If this SIGNI would leave the field, instead you may put this SIGNI on the bottom of its owner's deck.
[Auto]: When this SIGNI leaves the field, you may shuffle your deck. If you do, put the top two cards of your deck into your trash and look at the next four cards. Put up to one 《At//Memoria, Code: Labyrinth》 onto your field downed from among them. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
power_text: Look at the top and bottom card of your deck. Put up to one SIGNI from among them onto your field. Add the rest to your hand.

name: Urith//Memoria, Doomed Evil Queen
content:
[Auto]: At the beginning of your attack phase, you may discard two <Demon> SIGNI. If you do, target SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -12000 power until end of turn.
[Enter] {Colorless}: Add target <Demon> SIGNI other than 《Urith//Memoria, Doomed Evil Queen》 from your trash to your hand.

name: Dark Quetzal, Phantom Dragon Queen
content:
[Constant]: As long as there is at least one level one, one level two, and one level three SIGNI underneath this SIGNI, it gains "[Auto]: Whenever this SIGNI attacks, target SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -12000 power until end of turn." As long as there are two or more of each level, it also gains 【Assassin】.
[Auto]: At the beginning of your attack phase, shuffle your deck and put the top four cards under this SIGNI. (Put them face-up.)

name: Chisel, Blessed Beauty

[Auto]: At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, target level one SIGNI on your opponent's field loses its abilities until end of turn.
power_text: All SIGNI on your opponent's field lose their abilities until end of turn. Draw a card.

As you use this spell, you may pay Exceed 7 as an additional use cost. (Put seven cards underneath your LRIG into the LRIG Trash.)

Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put any number of them on the bottom of your deck in any order and the rest on top of your deck in any order. If you paid the Exceed 7, draw two cards.
power_text: You may discard a card. If you do, put target upped SIGNI on your opponent's field on the bottom of its owner's deck.

(Whenever a SIGNI on your field with 【Lancer】 vanishes a SIGNI on your opponent's field through battle, crush one of your opponent's Life Cloth.)

power_text: You may pay {Black} {Colorless}. If you do, target SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -12000 power until end of turn.

name: Gull - Wing, Code: Accel
content:
[Team] <Deus Ex Machina>
[Team Auto]: At the beginning of your attack phase, if there are two or more cards in your opponent's Ener Zone and you discarded one or more cards this turn, your opponent chooses a card from their Ener Zone and puts it into their trash.
[Action] {Red} {Red} {Colorless}: This SIGNI gains 【Double Crush】 until end of turn. (If this SIGNI deals damage to an opponent by attacking, crush two of your opponent's Life Cloth instead of one.)

name: Devil Stinger, Phantom Aquatic Beast
content: [Enter] Discard up to three cards: Draw cards equal to the number of cards discarded this way.
power_text: Choose one — ①Vanish target upped SIGNI on your opponent's field. ②Draw a card.

name: Obelisk, Code: Anti
content:
[Auto]: When a 【Soul】 is attached to this SIGNI, put the top two cards of your deck or your opponent's deck into their owner's trash.
[Enter] {Black} {Red} {Colorless} {Colorless}: Put target SIGNI from your trash onto your field. Then, vanish target SIGNI on your opponent's field with power less than the SIGNI that entered the field.

name: Eckesachs, Lightly Armed
content: (When paying costs, this card can be used as red or black.)

name: Servant ♯
content:
【Guard】 (You may discard this card to prevent damage from a single LRIG attack.)
[Constant]: 【Multi Ener】 (When paying costs, this card can be used as any color.)
power_text: Add target SIGNI from your trash to your hand.

name: Burning Calamity
content: Vanish target SIGNI on your opponent's field with power 12000 or less. Put the top two cards of your deck or your opponent's deck into their owner's trash.
power_text: Choose one — ①Vanish target upped SIGNI on your opponent's field. ②Put the top four cards of your deck or your opponent's deck into the trash.

name: Tamayorihime, Musical Moon Miko
content:
[Auto] {1/Turn}: When this LRIG attacks, you may down two upped SIGNI on your field and pay {White} {Colorless}. If you do, up this LRIG and this LRIG loses its abilities until end of turn.
[Enter]: Look at the top four cards of your deck. Add up to two cards from among them to your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
[Action] {1/Game} {Whitex0}: This LRIG gains "[Auto] {1/Turn}: When this LRIG attacks, up all SIGNI on your field" until end of turn.

name: Hanayo, Camellia
content: [Enter]: Vanish target SIGNI on your opponent's field with power 8000 or less. Draw a card and discard a card.

name: Hanayo, Orchid
content:
[Enter]: Vanish target SIGNI on your opponent's field.
[Enter] {Colorless}: Put target card from your opponent's Ener Zone that does not share a color with your opponent's Center LRIG into their trash.

name: Midoriko, Gemmation
content: [Enter]: 【Ener Charge 2】 (Put the top two cards of your deck into your Ener Zone.)

name: Midoriko, Reinforcement
content:
[Enter]: The next time you would take damage this turn, instead you do not take that damage.
[Enter] {Colorless} {Colorless}: All SIGNI on your field get +5000 power until end of turn.

name: Go to the Top!
content:
[Use Conditions] You have a white LRIG and a red LRIG on your field.

Search your deck for a SIGNI, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck after doing so. If your opponent's Center LRIG's level is three or more, they choose and put three cards from their Ener Zone into their trash. (If there are two or less cards, they put all of them into the trash.)

name: Burning Curiosity
content:
As you use this PIECE, you may pay Exceed 4 as an additional use cost. (Put four cards that are underneath your LRIG into the LRIG Trash.)

Vanish target SIGNI on your opponent's field. If you paid the Exceed 4, instead remove it from the game.

name: Aglaea, Blessed Angel
content: [Auto]: Whenever this SIGNI attacks, you may discard two <Angel> SIGNI. If you do, draw three cards.

name: Haniel, Blessed Angel
content: [Enter] {Colorless}: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Reveal a level two or less SIGNI from among them and add it to your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
power_text: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Reveal a SIGNI from among them and add it to your hand or put it onto your field. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Romail, Lightly Armed
content:
[Enter] {Colorless}: Vanish target SIGNI on your opponent's field with power 3000 or less.
(The text before the colon indicates the [Enter] ability's cost. You may choose not to pay it, in which case the [Enter] ability will not activate.)

name: Michael, Blessed Angel
content: [Constant]: As long as this SIGNI is in the left or right SIGNI Zone, SIGNI in your center SIGNI Zone get +3000 power.

name: Bow, High Armed
power_text: Return target SIGNI with power 8000 or less on your opponent's field to its owner's hand.

name: Athena, Blessed Angel
content:
[Enter] {White} {Colorless} {Colorless}: Add target SIGNI with a {Guard Icon} from your trash to your hand.
(The text before the colon indicates the [Enter] ability's cost. You may choose not to pay it, in which case the [Enter] ability will not activate.)

name: Arc Athena, Holy Angel
content:
[Auto]: At the beginning of your attack phase, if there is an <Armed> SIGNI on your field, up this SIGNI.
[Action] {White} {Down}: Return target SIGNI with power 8000 or less on your opponent's field to its owner's hand.

name: Letti, Heavy Armed
content: [Enter] {Red} {Colorless}: Add target red level one SIGNI from your trash to your hand.
power_text: Choose one — ①Vanish target upped SIGNI on your opponent's field. ②Draw a card.

name: Servant ♯
content:
【Guard】 (You may discard this card to prevent damage from a single LRIG attack.)
[Constant]: 【Multi Ener】 (When paying costs, this card can be used as any color.)
power_text: Add target SIGNI from your trash to your hand.

name: Get Big Bible
content: Look at the top seven cards of your deck. Reveal up to two SIGNI from among them and add them to your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in a random order.
power_text: Return target upped SIGNI on your opponent's field to its owner's hand.

name: Arcgwyn, Blessed Angel Queen
content:
[Constant]: During your opponent's turn, this SIGNI gains 【Shadow】. (This SIGNI cannot be targeted by your opponent.)
[Enter] {White}: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Reveal a SIGNI from among them and add it to your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
power_text: Choose one — ①Return target upped SIGNI on your opponent's field to its owner's hand. ②Draw a card.
